column2: #| tbl-cap: "Comparisons of the '<tt>absorbance</tt>' and '<tt>dabsorbance</tt>' columns of the five first rows of the '<tt>tecator</tt>' dataset. The column labelled as '<tt>dabsorbance</tt>' is composed of '<tt>tfd</tt>' objects, and represents the first order derivative of the '<tt>absorbance</tt>' column, as computed via finite differences."
